reviews.review_msg: Super nice teacher, always available for help, funny guy,explain concept clearly

Math-based prof for most of the sem but it serves as good practice for other econ courses. Overall, hard to understand at first, but after all the "is it right?"s and questionable grammar from time to time he really is AN AMAZING, FAIR and REASONABLE PROF. Approachable with a great sense of humor. ABSOLUTELY WORTH TAKING ANY COURSE WITH HIM! =)

Jiamin is well-organized and clear about what she's teaching! Although lectures are boring but i actually learn ALOT for her. Do the tutorial Qs and go to her or TA's office hour--that's how you learn. Exams are ok long as you study you'll be fine.
The midterms are so difficult, some of the questions are not even be taught by the Prof, but she is expecting you know how to do it.
Her notes are easy to understand.She is sweet and helpful prof.

No good, mdts appear to be easy compare to final exam. The final was extremely hard which only consists of 6 written questions. She gave Surrey students much easier version for all exams, that's so unfair. Do not like her! Strong accent!

Must attend lectures if you want to pass. Prof was nice but the lectures were very dry. Tutorials were horrible because the TA was very slow and uninteresting and seemed like he didn't want to be there at all. As a result, tutorial attendance was always bad. Overall, a very dry course.

Go to lecture and take good notes. Some tricky questions on the exams to see who's been paying more attention. Barely used the text in the exams but it helps to understand the material. Not much reading. Overall decent prof.

pretty good prof. he takes things slow, makes sure that you understand the material fully. love his 2 midterm system! one thing: ALWAYS GO TO LECTURE AND TUTORIAL. for some reason he loves the text book even though its a bus. text. he can be boring and sometimes his lectures does not make sense until you read the text. would take him again.

Not a good prof. He's nice but does not know what he's talking about. Always has to refer to his notes and he's teaches things that aren't in the textbook. So you have to know both textbook stuff and stuff he teaches. TAKE 290 WITH SOMEONE ELSE !
this is the same person as gulriz. and yes. she's fricken terrible
Willing to help you out.  Notes are easy to understand.  Midterms are tricky but still is passable.
Can I be an Econ instructor instead?
good notes, non stop copying notes distracts u from hearing what she says.
Hot & Sexy, easy to follow the class! Youngest professor I've seen.

gets confused over her own notes all the time. brings up irrelevant material and presents it in such an awkward and confusing manner. she needs some lessons in english and in teaching. is also rude and yells all the time. i will definitely definitely avoid her like the plague. just glad it was only a 200-level course and not 301.
Terrible,the final is terrible,everything is terrible......

basically i'd rather graduate a semester late than have to have her again for econ 301. she taught a whole bunch of sh*t not in the textbook and i kinda think she made some of it up no joke :( don't understand a word out of her mouth. notes so disorganized and random.

has real trouble expressing ideas in a clear and coherent fashion. obvs english is her second language, but her wording is terrible and spelling/grammar is a mess. conveys ideas in such an awkward manner. at the end of the semester wouldn't tell us which chapters were covered, said "you figure it out". i suspect because she doesn't know herself.
Disaster. Sometimes she does not even know what she is talking about. Midterm marking is confusing, MC so midleading! I hope i did not take it...
i just wanna say it is so boring!!! so much notes and she just read the notes.  maybe more effecient that you read the textbook and learning it by yourself.
Fantastic prof. Very clear.

OMG he is the worse prof EVER. his marking is seriously ridiculous, he required so much detail in his exams and his assignments that it seem like he thinks we only have his class to study for. He require so much statistics in his answer. Avoid him at all cost unless u have a lot of free time to wrote like a 6 page assignment

Very organized and professional. His notes are clear and his exams are challenging, but straightforward. He was very helpful when I came to him privately for help and explained things very clearly. My only criticism is that not enough practice problems are provided and no textbook for ECON 290 to do further readings.

His class is very simple. No surprises whatsover. If you do and understand the weekly questions (which are usually only 4/week), you will excel. Notes are well-organized. Easy to do well, he is difficult to understand at times b/c of his accent but material in this class is easy enough so that it doesn't really matter.

Best Prof ever!! I've took his 105 290 282, his lecture is organized and his exams not that hard if you have done his tutorial questions, MC sample questions and understand them. He's patient and helpful, he is my favourite.
ok
Great prof! the lecture notes are very clear. As long as you understand and remember the notes, you are good for the exams. I never used my textbook.

All I got to say is he's impossible to argue with. TA's were much more helpful but the teaching staff for this course tends to pass around responsibility too much.For example, TA1 says "I agree, talk to prof for marks" Prof says, "Mmm I dont know, talk to TA2." TA2 says, "Only prof can change marks, talk to him."                          WWWWWWTFFF

he said his notes are enough for the course,its not true...went to every lecture and at the end i ended up photo copying  the textbook for detailed info or else...since his notes are extremely brief...dont even anticipate a good mark if you just study his notes. Final is extremely hard, some questions are gay that are not even taught in class.

he is the typical asian prof. loves math, straight forward notes, teaches them as he copys it from his notes, EXTREMELY HIGH EXPECTATIONS ON MIDTERMS AND FINAL! hes gives great notes and easy textbook but he will ask you killer questions so memorization will not matter here. He tests you on your comprehension.

This guy is the most straight-forward prof you will ever get.  You probably won't use the textbook,, I sure didn't.. this class is very little work.. 2 midterms 25% each and final worth 50%.. 90% of the questions are from your NOTES..JunJie is a good man

Junjie is so calculation based that he cannot explain anything unless it is a math based problem.  He is so caught up in writing calculations in lecture and tutorial that he never answers questions.  Course difficulty, well I am getting a A in Econ 291 and all my other courses and getting a C- in his course. Nuff said...
I took both ECON 290 and 291 with him. He is goooooood!

Organized, easy-going and helpful prof. The lecture notes he sent u are hard to understand if u dun attend lectures. make sure u focus on the notes while studying for exams. The tutorial questions are almost completely different from the exams! Lucky enough that midterms are fairly easy, but final exam is very tough.
No Comments
BAD NSTRUCTOR I HAVE NEVER SEEN
No Comments
No Comments
No Comments
worst prof. ever~~~~
Excellent prof. Very smart and really knows his stuff. Lectures were very informative and relates the material to interesting real world examples. Will definitely take another course with Easton.
well good luck and TA is not good
good luck and marking scheme is unfair. TA's not good
oh ! good luck

Really nice and helpful. Always gave a ton of practice midterms and finals to study from. Midterms were too easy; basically a competition for a high a mark since it's curved with the average being a C - C+. Final was brutal.. Maybe to make up for, I don't know

go take it if u wanna get a F! She always says: "I don't know, I'm not sure..." is hard to get what she mean and the exams are so hard! TAs are helpless, didn't explain the tutorial questions clearly...the combination of prof + TAs = Fail!
Her notes are very organized. Midterms are fair and final is a little harder as expected
I had her for 103, did ok. And, choose her again for 290. The content itself is ok, she explains well, but you need to read the text book. Exams are a bit hard than I expect. But she's nice though.
nice professor, very very organized.clear notes.let you know what to expect in the exam. she makes sure everyone is doing their best. willing to help students. exams are fair. overall great prof.
took her class in summertime.. She's an ok teacher, explains things quite clearly and gives very good notes.. her TA, Greg was AMAZING!!
I don't like her. She makes things complicated. And sometimes she is talking nonsense. Hard exams.
